page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Not many people are employed in the village of Bishop Middleham itself. There is some work, in the small clothing factory, the pie factory, the shops and the pubs but most people travel to the larger towns and cities for their employment.
Many of the villagers are employed in the engineering and electrical industries in the towns of Stockton, Teesside, Sunderland and Newcastle.
There is not much unemployment among the villagers of Bishop Middleham, but school leavers are finding it increasingly difficult to find work.
